trans-unit.source: Describes system limits and recommended sizes for Stream Analytics components and connections.
trans-unit.target: Describes system limits and recommended sizes for Stream Analytics components and connections.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of Streaming Units per subscription per region
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of Streaming Units per subscription per region

trans-unit.source: A request to increase streaming units for your subscription beyond 50 can be made by contacting [Microsoft Support](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us).
trans-unit.target: A request to increase streaming units for your subscription beyond 50 can be made by contacting [Microsoft Support](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us).

trans-unit.source: Maximum throughput of a Streaming Unit
trans-unit.target: Maximum throughput of a Streaming Unit

trans-unit.source: Maximum throughput per SU depends on the scenario.
trans-unit.target: Maximum throughput per SU depends on the scenario.

trans-unit.source: Actual throughput may be lower and depends query complexity and partitioning.
trans-unit.target: Actual throughput may be lower and depends query complexity and partitioning.

trans-unit.source: Further details can be found in the [Scale Azure Stream Analytics jobs to increase throughput](../articles/stream-analytics/stream-analytics-scale-jobs.md) article.
trans-unit.target: Further details can be found in the [Scale Azure Stream Analytics jobs to increase throughput](../articles/stream-analytics/stream-analytics-scale-jobs.md) article.

trans-unit.source: This limit may be increased in the future.
trans-unit.target: This limit may be increased in the future.

trans-unit.source: This limit may be increased in the future.
trans-unit.target: This limit may be increased in the future.
